name: University of Southampton timetable conversion
tagline: A Simple python script for converting a University of Southampton timetable webpages into ical files
body:
This is a very simple python script that converts a University of Southampton new (as of 2015/16) calendar to an icalendar standard format (.ics)

this icalendar format can then be used to import into many calendars such as Google Calendar.

## Installation

(To install this script you need a very basic knowledge of the terminal)

1. [Download Python 2 or 3](https://www.python.org/downloads/) if you haven't already.

2. Clone the script with git, or download and extract the zip files

3. (Optional) Create a virtual environment to install the dependencies with `pyvenv venv` or `virtualenv venv`. Activate with `source venv/bin/activate`. 

4. Install `python-lxml` or run `pip install -r requirements.txt`.

5. Run the script and follow the steps `python timetable_converter.py`.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
